short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly mark all sections of your Udemy courses as complete with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly mark all sections of your Udemy courses as complete with a single click! This extension is perfect for users who want to quickly navigate through their courses and ensure all sections are marked as completed.

Features:
Works for both business and personal Udemy accounts.
One-click button to mark all sections of a Udemy course as complete.
Certificate of completion will be received on the user's email ID.

How to Use:
Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open any Udemy course page and ensure the course content panel is open.
Click on the extension icon to open the popup.
Click the "Complete course" button.
Watch as all sections are marked as complete!
If all sections are not marked complete in one go, try the same steps again.

Permissions:
Access to active tab to execute the script on Udemy course pages.
Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Udemy.
